dialogs.sentenses: Oh! My head! What happened here?

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: Wait, can you talk?
Of course I know, what would I be if I didn't know?

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: But birds do not know how to speak, maybe parrots and crows that speak a few words or phrases. Now actually talking, that is not even possible.
Uhhh! Oh, I'm all sore.

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: Oh that? Well you attacked me first so I just retaliated.
You are crazy! > Look at your size! I am onlyâ€¦
I am...

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: A bird!
I can't remember who I am.

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: This is weird, but don't worry you'll soon remember. > Listen! Have you seen a girl like me walking around?
I don't know... I was sleeping and then I heard a noise, so... I attacked you for some reason but I can't remember.

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: Wow, I'm so worried that I ended up not asking you what your name is...
Name? I don't remember having a name...

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: Look, you look very confused, and I'm not really enjoying this fog around here, I have a bad feeling. > I'll keep looking for my sister, if you want you can accompany me so you won't be alone.
I think I'd better walk with you for now, I'm also getting a bad feeling in the air.

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: Let's go this way Alma!

dialogs.name: ALMA
dialogs.sentenses: Alma?

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: Yeah, I guess I'll call you that for now, just until you remember who you are.

dialogs.name: ALMA
dialogs.sentenses: All right, I think.

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: I'm Zia by the way
